title: [娱乐|机械|综合]powerofpickle's Jetpacks——更好的喷气背包[1.8.1]
txt_content:
本帖最后由 1582952890 于 2017-9-16 08:29 编辑 





wR4tdm4.png (151.54 KB, 下载次数: 16)

下载附件

2015-2-25 02:32 上传





这是一款插件版的喷气背包，插件不仅增加了喷气背包还增加了太阳能帽子
在服务器中可以给VIP使用特权233

合成方式如下





7pKUWJh.png (118.99 KB, 下载次数: 20)

下载附件

2015-2-25 02:31 上传






注：飞行消耗煤炭
Jetpack  You can craft a jetpack, which allows you to fly in Survival mode when equipped. However, it will quickly run out of fuel, in which case you will need some coal or charcoal in your inventory for it to fill back up. The durability bar on the jetpack indicates how much fuel is left.  NEW: You can also get a short speed boost while flying by right-clicking with a fuel item in your hand. This will consume the fuel. 
 Solar Helmet  You may also craft the solar helmet. If you wear the solar helmet while flying in the daylight, your jetpack will lose fuel at a slower rate. If you are not flying, it will gradually fill your jetpack back up. With the solar helmet in combination with lots of coal in your inventory, you will be able to use your jetpack for a long time. Just remember that the solar helmet only functions when exposed to daylight

指令与权限：
/jetpack or /solarhelmet|获得喷气背包或者太阳能帽子|jetpacks.commands|默认OP
jetpacks.canfly: 允许玩使用背包
jetpacks.cancraft.jetpack：允许玩家制作背包
jetpacks.cancraft.solarhelmet：允许玩家制作太阳帽
  jetpacks.canboost：允许玩家右键添加燃料
配置文件
jetpack-material: iron_chestplate|背包材料
solar-helmet-material: iron_helmet|帽子材料
fuel-capacity: 240|油箱容量
jetpack-name: Jetpack|物品名称
particle-effect: true|粒子效果
boost: true|增加燃料
play-sound: true|声音
jetpack-recipe:背包的合成方式
  shapeless: false
  '1': diamond
  '2': furnace
  '3': diamond
  '4': redstone
  '5': iron_chestplate
  '6': redstone
  '7': diamond
  '8': fireball
  '9': diamond
solar-helmet-recipe:|帽子的合成方式
  shapeless: true
  '1': iron_helmet
  '2': daylight_detector
  '3': redstone
  '4': none
  '5': none
  '6': none
  '7': none
  '8': none
  '9': none
fuels:
- coal
- blaze_powder
注：可自行配置合成方式


如果喜欢请麻烦给个人气吧233给人气不用花费自己的人气
